title: Welcome to My World
description: Lil “Furor” Aona never knew the world before the demons took over. Her race, the Bête Noir, fight them. The demons have always been their enemies. The world, however, isn't so simple. To the humans, the Diras are benevolent rulers. Humans see the Bête Noire as the abominations. Lil and her family know better. They've fought enough demons. The Diras want to destroy all humans. What's their final plan? Will Lil ever find out? Everything begins at the end.
author: Auden Johnson
